message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to offer it to you for $14000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm still confident in the product's value. I'm willing to meet you halfway - I'll sell it to you for $12000. It's a fair price considering its worth to you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $10500?

I understand you're still a bit hesitant, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'll sell it to you for $11500. It's getting close to my minimum, but I think it's still a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $11000?
I'm getting close to my minimum, Bob. I'll make one more concession. I'll sell it to you for $11200. This is my final offer, so I hope you'll consider it.
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $10800, and throw in any additional features or services you think are valuable?

I understand you're still hesitant, Bob. I'll throw in some additional features that will make the product even more valuable to you. I'll sell it to you for $10900, and include a comprehensive training session and a one-year warranty. This is my final offer, so I hope you'll consider it.
I appreciate the additional features and warranty, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $10500, with everything included?
